DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to compare two different surfaces of bone anchored hearing aid abutments in terms of bacterial colonization, inflammatory response and skin reactions.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Survey of Different Abutment Topologies
DOC.criteria: Any adult (18 years of age or older) patient eligible for a bone anchored hearing system Inability or unwillingness to participate in followup Skin thickness of > 10 mm Diseases known to compromise bone quality Irradiated in the implant area
